Content

Source: R/content.R
Content.Rd

An R6 class that represents content

See also

Other R6 classes: Bundle, ContentTask, Environment, RStudioConnect, Task, Vanity, VariantSchedule, VariantTask, Variant

Public fields

connect

An R6 Connect object

content

The content details from RStudio Connect

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Arguments
